The annual White Rose Varsity tournament between York and Hull has been cancelled

Salvation has been announced as the official venue for Wednesday nights, but the sponsorship process has been criticised by a number of University sports clubs.

The University of York has been ranked as the best UK university under 50 years old for a second year running according to the 2013 Times Higher Education (THE) World Top 100 rankings

This online data project confirmed a few anecdotal truisms about accommodation for us, but also provides some new interesting insights.
